name: Patagonian Andean Forest and Mountain Tour
description: Bariloche is the most important tourist destination in Argentina’s Patagonia region, within and around it you can find a variety of landscapes that show different faces and colors each season, including the the inhospitable yet breath-taking Patagonian Steppe (a cold desert and the largest in Argentina), vast and crystal-clear lakes, imposing mountains which allow winter sports and summer treks and hikes, challenging natural climbing walls and main destination of this triip, the magical Patagonian Andean Forest (a type of temperate to cold forest).
